verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit, come and fill this place oh Lord
For I long to know You more in a deeper way
Come Holy Spirit and change my heart
Open my eyes open my ears

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I want to know You more
My heart thirst after You, oh God

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Allah Roh Kudus, aku merindukan-Mu
Penuhi kami, Tuhan
Ku rindu hadirat-Mu Tuhan

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Allah Roh Kudus penuhi kami
Ku rindu Kau selalu dalam hidupku
Allah Roh Kudus ubah hatiku
Celikkanku, jamahlah ku rindu hadirat-Mu

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Kusembah kudus
Kudus, kuduslah Tuhan
Dan kusanjung Kau mulia
Mulia bagi-Mu Tuhan

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
And I cry holy, holy, holy is the Lord
And I exalt You glory, glory, glory to the Lord
And I cry holy, holy, holy is the Lord
And I exalt You glory, glory, glory to the Lord
Glory to the Lord
